commit.message:
parse.y (function_invocation): Reverse parameter list.

2005-06-15  James A. Morrison  <phython@gcc.gnu.org>

        * parse.y (function_invocation): Reverse parameter list.
        * treetree.c (tree_code_get_expression): Don't reverse parameter list.

From-SVN: r100998
